result.eng: There isn't much space between the two houses.
result.ga: Níl mórán spáis idir an dá theach
result.orig: Níl mórán spáis idir an dá theach
result.html: Níl mórán spáis idir an dá theachThere isn't much space between the two houses.
result.ponchtml: Níl mórán spáis idir an dá ṫeaċThere isn't much space between the two houses.

result.eng: This house was being used as a courthouse.
result.ga: Bhí an teach seo á úsáid mar theach cúirte
result.orig: Bhí an teach seo á úsáid mar theach cúirte
result.html: Bhí an teach seo á úsáid mar theach cúirteThis house was being used as a courthouse.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an teaċ seo á úsáid mar ṫeaċ cúirteThis house was being used as a courthouse.

result.eng: There was hunger in every house at that time.
result.ga: Bhíodh ocras i chuile theach an uair sin
result.orig: Bhíodh ocras i chuile theach an uair sin
result.html: Bhíodh ocras i chuile theach an uair sinThere was hunger in every house at that time.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoḋ ocras i ċuile ṫeaċ an uair sinThere was hunger in every house at that time.

result.eng: The shop is only half a mile from my house.
result.ga: Níl an siopa ach leathmhíle ó mo theach
result.orig: Níl an siopa ach leathmhíle ó mo theach
result.html: Níl an siopa ach leathmhíle ó mo theachThe shop is only half a mile from my house.
result.ponchtml: Níl an siopa aċ leaṫṁíle ó mo ṫeaċThe shop is only half a mile from my house.

result.html: Seo é mo theachThis is my house.
result.ponchtml: Seo é mo ṫeaċThis is my house.

result.eng: The train goes directly from my house to my workplace.
result.ga: Tá an traein ag dul díreach ó mo theach go dtí mo láthair oibre
result.orig: Tá an traein ag dul díreach ó mo theach go dtí mo láthair oibre
result.html: Tá an traein ag dul díreach ó mo theach go dtí mo láthair oibreThe train goes directly from my house to my workplace.
result.ponchtml: Tá an traein ag dul díreaċ ó mo ṫeaċ go dtí mo láṫair oibreThe train goes directly from my house to my workplace.

result.eng: I have my own house now.
result.ga: Tá mo theach féin agam anois
result.orig: Tá mo theach féin agam anois
result.html: Tá mo theach féin agam anoisI have my own house now.
result.ponchtml: Tá mo ṫeaċ féin agam anoisI have my own house now.

result.eng: Your house is on this street.
result.ga: Tá do theach ar an tsráid seo
result.orig: Tá do theach ar an tsráid seo
result.html: Tá do theach ar an tsráid seoYour house is on this street.
result.ponchtml: Tá do ṫeaċ ar an tsráid seoYour house is on this street.

result.eng: I have no garden, alas, but there's a big park very close to my house
result.ga: Níl gairdín ar bith agam faraor ach tá páirc mhór an-ghar do mo theach
result.orig: Níl gairdín ar bith agam faraor ach tá páirc mhór an-ghar do mo theach
result.html: Níl gairdín ar bith agam faraor ach tá páirc mhór an-ghar do mo theachI have no garden, alas, but there's a big park very close to my house
result.ponchtml: Níl gairdín ar biṫ agam faraor aċ tá páirc ṁór an-ġar do mo ṫeaċI have no garden, alas, but there's a big park very close to my house

result.eng: The pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
result.ga: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann
result.orig: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann
result.html: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh annThe pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an pota ċoṁ mór sin go ḃféadfá braċán do ṫeaċ lán boċtán a ḋéanaṁ annThe pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
